Transport

Transport

new Transport()

Source:
  • src/Transport/Transport.js, line 13

Transport layer. This layer is an abstraction above all different sorts of communication.

Methods

send(opt, responseCallback)

Source:
  • src/Transport/Transport.js, line 59

opt should have:

  • node {string} address of destination,
  • route {string} url of outgoing middleware stack
  • payload {object}. depending on route , it can have userPayload, service or _id
Parameters:
Name Type Description
opt Obeject

the options object.
responseCallback function

the callback of the message. Note that this is valid only for http calls. UDP / TCP calls do not have a callback
